about.heading: About Miss Mermaid
about.body:
Miss Mermaid Cattery was founded to elevate the Sphynx breed through art, ethics, and scientific care. Every cat here is a living sculpture, nurtured with warmth and respect.

““Beauty is born from care, not chance.””

about.heading: Our Breeding Philosophy
about.body: We breed selectively, focusing on structure, temperament, and health—not just looks. Ethics and artistry guide our choices.

about.heading: World-Class Bloodlines
about.body: Our cats carry lines from multiple CFA Best Sphynx and NW winners. All breeding cats are DNA-tested and HCM-clear.

about.heading: Life at Miss Mermaid
about.body: Our Sphynx enjoy open rooms, enrichment play, and family life—never cages. Love, sunlight, and cleanliness define their world.

guides.title: How to bathe a Sphynx?
guides.body: Use warm water and gentle, fragrance-free baby soap weekly.

guides.title: What should they eat?
guides.body: High-protein wet food, avoid grains; hydration is essential.

faq.question: Are Sphynx cats hypoallergenic?
faq.answer: They produce less dander but still cause mild allergies to some.

policies.body_en: Approved guardians secure their kitten with a non-refundable deposit that is applied to the final adoption balance. Deposits confirm your nursery placement and hold the kitten for seven days while logistics are coordinated.

Every Miss Mermaid Sphynx receives veterinary clearance, HCM-focused cardiac screening, vaccinations, and parasite prevention before departure. Guardians receive medical records and a two-year congenital health guarantee.
Kittens may be collected in Los Angeles or delivered by licensed pet courier. Temperature-controlled travel crates, care kits, and acclimation coaching are provided to ensure a gentle transition.

terms.body_en: By browsing missmermaidsphynx.com you agree to use the content for personal guardianship research only. Redistribution, automated scraping, or resale of intellectual property is prohibited without written consent.
All photography, videography, branding, and written material are owned by Miss Mermaid Sphynx. Trademarks and imagery may not be reproduced without licensing.

privacy.body_en: We collect contact details, application answers, and communication preferences you submit through our forms. This information is stored securely and used solely to evaluate guardianship suitability.
Details allow us to personalise adoption guidance, share nursery updates, and comply with contract obligations. We never sell data to third parties and honour deletion requests at any time.
